00047   void testMenuAddItem(){ 
00048     this->m_caption->addItem(new MenuItem("MenuItemTest"));
00049     unsigned int ret=this->m_caption->itemCount();
00050     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==1 );
00051   }

00056   void testMenuName(){ 
00057     const char* name="MenuNameTest";
00058     this->m_caption->setName(name);
00059     const char* name2=this->m_caption->getName();
00060     int ret=strcmp(name, name2);
00061     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==0 );
00062   }
00063 
00067   void testMenuWidth(){ 
00068     char* name="MenuNameTestWidth";
00069     int nameLen=strlen(name);
00070     this->m_caption->addItem(new MenuItem(name));
00071     int l=this->m_caption->getWidth();
00072     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( nameLen==l );
00073   }
